name: Swaniti Initiative
briefDescription: Swaniti is a non profit that works to deliver development solutions across India by leveraging government resources and infrastructure. We work with the community to identify challenges and design solutions and then in partnership with government officials implement solutions on the ground.  We are rooted in eighteen states where we leverage state and central programs to initiate, implement and accelerate development solutions in communities and districts. We focus on health, education, gender, livelihood and water & sanitation to create direct impact on the lives of the most vulnerables. Thus far, Swaniti has worked with over three hundred and fifty Parliamentarians, fifteen state level legislators, eight district magistrates and four Chief Ministersâ€™ (CMs) offices to impact the lives of over two hundred and fifty thousand people. Our interventions have been through on ground implementation support in the constituency (Engagement), research support on key developmental programs that catalyzes actions (Knowledge Insights) and strategic data and technology support to enable better decision-making (Data and Technology Insight).
